author: rooneg
msg: Misc. cleanups to the 'svn diff --summarize' code.
(text_mod_char, summarize_func): Add docstrings explaining what these do.
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Move --summarize up with the other diff specific

author: lundblad
msg: Fix regression in svn_wc_add_repos_file2, causing svn copy/move of a modified
file to not detect the modifications when committing the operation.
(svn_wc_add_repos_file2): Only set text-time field of destination entry when
we know text-base and working file are the same.
(force_move): Extend to cover committing the moved item as well.

author: giorgio_valoti
msg: * subversion/po/it.po:  - Fixed all fuzzy translations and translated

author: brane
msg: * STATUS: Add a note to r18144 et al. about pending bug fixes.
